block_comment: The block of code recounts the busyness of read buffer hits. The implementation initiates a counter "rb_hit_busy_cnt" to zero. Next, it operates a loop from 0 to nBANK_MACHS-1. Each time the specific indexed "rb_hit_busy_r" holds true, increment the "rb_hit_busy_cnt" by one. Consequently, "rb_hit_busy_cnt" reflects the number of set/busy instances in array "rb_hit_busy_r".
